access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eclipsed Vitality](/Feats.aspx?ID=3613) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 80

**Archetypes** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48), [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890) or [Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047); Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead. You're always taking precautions when [Avoiding Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=511), [Hiding](/Actions.aspx?ID=62), and [Sneaking](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) to foil [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21), and you're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to any creature using only precise lifesense to observe you.
name: Eclipsed Vitality
prerequisite: Assassin Dedication or Scout Dedication; Master in Stealth

You're always taking precautions when Avoiding Notice, Hiding, and Sneaking to foil lifesense, and you're concealed to any creature using only precise lifesense to observe you.
